text: Kashi known by his professional name Sanketh Kashi, was an Indian film actor in the Kannada film industry. Some of the notable films of Kashi as an actor include Ulta Palta (1997), Nammoora Mandara Hoove (1996), Beladingalagi Baa (2008), and Mangalyam Tantunanena (1998). ==Career== Kashi was part of more than one hundred and forty films in Kannada, including television series 'Malgudi Days'. ==Awards== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Award ! Film ! Credits ! Category !
